overview: There are roads that can change your life. Such was the road through the Don Steppe, which clashed two fates: a KAMAZ driver named Tikhon, who, in pursuit of easy earnings, agreed to deliver drugs hidden in boxes of oranges, and Deacon George, who was carrying a new bell for the stanitsa church on the eve of Epiphany. Where will this dangerous road lead them? Who will emerge victorious from this insidious and very dangerous game?
title: No Issue from Don
